snippet.title: Revenge of the Antagonist - Enemies to Lovers BL (Boys Love)
snippet.description:
Wishlist the game on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2831570/Revenge_of_the_Antagonist/?beta=1

Gerald isn't a known actor, so he struggles to land roles. But the guy who (unintentionally) made a mockery of him became a popular heartthrob.
Who wouldn't feel resentful?
Years later, the two reunite as the antagonist and protagonist for a romance drama.

#bl #boyslove #visualnovel
